description:
Delices De Cartier EDT - A Fruity Gourmand Masterpiece

Experience the delightful allure of Delices De Cartier Eau de Toilette, a captivating Cartier fragrance that embodies feminine elegance and playful sophistication. This 100ml treasure combines juicy fruits and delectable gourmand notes to create an irresistible sensory journey that's both sweet and sophisticated. ‚ú®

The Essence of Delices De Cartier

Launched in 2006, this fruity gourmand fragrance was crafted by the talented perfumer Christine Nagel as a celebration of feminine indulgence. The Delices De Cartier EDT is designed for the woman who embraces joy and sensuality with confidence. Every spritz delivers a cherry-infused delight that evolves beautifully throughout the day. üçí

Product Information
Size 100ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Toilette
Concentration EDT
Brand Cartier

Fragrance Composition

The Delices De Cartier fragrance unfolds in a symphony of carefully selected notes that create a mouthwatering yet elegant olfactory experience. From the initial burst of fruity freshness to the warm, comforting base, this bestselling perfume is a true sensory journey. üå∏

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Sour Cherry, Bergamot, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes Violet, Jasmine, Freesia
Base Notes Amber, Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Cinnamon, Sandalwood

Key Features of Delices De Cartier EDT

  • üî• Signature cherry gourmand scent with perfect balance of sweetness
  • üíé Elegant Cartier bottle design with distinctive red cap and luxurious presentation
  • üåø Moderate longevity of 6-8 hours with intimate sillage
  • ‚ú® Versatile fragrance ideal for day wear and special occasions
  • üí´ Part of Cartier's prestigious fragrance collection

The Legacy of Cartier Fragrances

Since 1981, Cartier has been creating exceptional fragrances that complement their legendary jewelry heritage. Delices De Cartier represents the brand's ability to capture feminine essence in olfactory form. This new arrival to our collection embodies the luxury and craftsmanship that Cartier is renowned for worldwide.

Frequently Asked Question

What makes Delices De Cartier different from other fruity fragrances?
Unlike typical fruity scents, Delices De Cartier EDT balances its cherry sweetness with sophisticated amber and spice notes, creating a gourmand complexity that elevates it beyond simple fruit fragrances. The masterful blend avoids becoming cloying, instead offering an elegant, mature interpretation of fruit notes that remains playful yet sophisticated.
short_description: Discover Delices De Cartier EDT, a captivating 100ml women's fragrance featuring succulent cherry, floral heart notes, and warm amber-vanilla base. This fruity gourmand masterpiece by Cartier balances sweet indulgence with sophisticated elegance, perfect for the confident woman who embraces joyful femininity.

meta_description: Experience the irresistible Delices De Cartier EDT with juicy cherry, elegant florals, and warm vanilla notes. Shop this 100ml luxury fragrance today for free delivery!
